title: Atypical erythema nodosum in a patient with COVID-19 pneumonia.
text: Atypical erythema nodosum in a patient with COVID-19 pneumonia.

similar.title: Atypical erythema multiforme palmar plaques lesions due to Sars-Cov-2.
text: Atypical erythema multiforme palmar plaques lesions due to Sars-Cov-2.

Since CoronaVirus Disease 19 (COVID-19) was declared as a pandemic, all medical specialties were at the front, including dermatology. Daily, there are observations mentioning possible cutaneous manifestations of Sars-Cov-2. Among these manifestations, the most often was a rash which could be erythematous, morbilliform or urticarial mimicking viral exanthema, or chickenpox-like vesicles [1-3]. Anecdotally, dengue-like petechial eruption was reported [4].
abstract: Since CoronaVirus Disease 19 (COVID-19) was declared as a pandemic, all medical specialties were at the front, including dermatology. Daily, there are observations mentioning possible cutaneous manifestations of Sars-Cov-2. Among these manifestations, the most often was a rash which could be erythematous, morbilliform or urticarial mimicking viral exanthema, or chickenpox-like vesicles [1-3]. Anecdotally, dengue-like petechial eruption was reported [4].
